Mailing Address: c/o Administration OfficePO Box 202221434 Graham StKelowna, BC     V1Y 9H2
Service Details: - Offers a purpose driven drop-in program for homeless youth and those at risk of homelessness, ages 12 -19 years- Works to provide a safe, supportive environment, basic needs, recreational activities and opportunities, as well as life-skills training- Youth in need can access showers, laundry services, food and drink, internet, and resource information
Hours: Mon-Fri: 8:00am - 5:00pm- Snacks, drinks and meals are offered throughout the day for youth
